existing_features.title: Below the price of each candle product card in the Services/Products section, add three action elements: a 'Place Order' button, an 'Add to Cart' button, and a Wishlist heart icon button. All three should be visually styled to match the warm terracotta/sand theme of the shop.

Add a Cart area (slide-out drawer or dedicated section) that lists items added via 'Add to Cart'. It should display product name, price, quantity controls, and a subtotal. Cart state should be managed in React state.
Add a Wishlist area (dedicated section or slide-out panel) that lists items saved via the Wishlist heart icon on product cards. Wishlist state should be managed in React state.
Add a Customer Address input section in the checkout/order flow (triggered by 'Place Order'). The form should collect: full name, street address, city/town, PIN code, and phone number.
In the order/checkout flow, offer only UPI as the payment method. Display a UPI payment option with a UPI ID or QR code placeholder. No other payment methods (cash, card, etc.) should be shown.

Update the About section text to read: 'It Is My Dream Business'. Update the home/location detail displayed on the site (footer, contact, or about) to show: 'Diamond Harbour, Falta'. Update the contact phone number to '+91 86173 76874'. Update the service tagline to 'Glow Your Beautiful Moments'.
